about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about Souq Al-Sharqia, your trusted classified ads platform
about.description: Your trusted partner in buying and selling in the Eastern Province. We connect buyers and sellers through a safe and easy-to-use platform that serves the local community.
about.story_content: Souq Al-Sharqia was founded with a simple vision: to create a safe and reliable marketplace that serves the Eastern Province community. We started as a small local platform and have grown to become the leading classified ads website in the region.
about.mission_content: To provide a safe, easy, and reliable platform that connects buyers and sellers in the Eastern Province, helping build a strong local economy.
about.vision_content: To be the first choice for everyone looking to buy or sell anything in the Eastern Province, through innovation and excellent service.
values: Trust and credibility in all dealings
about.our_story_content: From a small local platform to the leading classified ads website in the Eastern Province, our journey has been driven by our commitment to serving the community and providing the best experience for our users.
about.our_mission_content: To connect buyers and sellers through a safe and easy-to-use platform, helping to build a strong local economy and support small businesses.
about.our_vision_content: To be the first choice for everyone looking to buy or sell anything in the Eastern Province, through innovation and excellent service.
about.team_content: Our team consists of experienced professionals in technology, marketing, and customer service, all working together to provide the best experience for our users.
about.contact_content: We're here to help you anytime. Don't hesitate to contact us for any inquiry or assistance.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read the terms and conditions carefully before using the website
terms.introduction_content: Welcome to Souq Al-Sharqia, the leading classified ads platform. By using this website, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
allowed_items: Use clear and real product images
website_responsibility_items: Provide a secure platform for ads
terms.fees_description: The website has the right to charge fees for some advanced services such as:
terms.feature_ad_description: Make your ad at the top
terms.boost_ad_description: Re-raise the ad to the top
terms.modifications_content: Souq Al-Sharqia reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Users will be notified of any important changes via email or through notifications on the website. Your continued use of the website after modifications means your acceptance of the new terms.
terms.contact_text: For any inquiries about the terms and conditions, please

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data
privacy.commitment_content: At Souq Al-Sharqia, we take your privacy very seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information when using our website and services.
privacy.service_operation_desc: Manage your account, publish ads, and facilitate communication
privacy.service_improvement_desc: Analyze usage and develop new features
privacy.no_selling_statement: We never sell your personal information
privacy.sharing_cases_intro: We may share limited information only in the following cases:
sharing_cases: With trusted service providers (such as payment services)
When requested by competent legal authorities
To protect our rights or the rights of other users
In case of website ownership transfer (after notifying you)
privacy.encryption_desc: All sensitive data is encrypted using SSL standards
privacy.limited_access_desc: Only authorized employees can access data
privacy.monitoring_desc: We continuously monitor our systems to detect any threats
privacy.backup_desc: Regular backups to ensure no data loss
exercise_rights: We will respond within 30 business days
privacy.cookies_intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on the website:
privacy.cookies_control: You can control cookie settings from your browser
privacy.contact_text: For any inquiries about the privacy policy, email us at:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you, contact us anytime
contact.response_content: We strive to respond to all messages within 24 hours on business days
contact.how_to_post: How can I post an ad?
contact.post_answer: You can easily post an ad by creating a free account and clicking on 'Add New Ad'
contact.edit_ad: Can I edit my ad after posting?
contact.edit_answer: Yes, you can edit your ad anytime through your control panel
contact.boost_cost: How much does ad boosting cost?
contact.boost_answer: The cost varies depending on the type of boost and duration. You can check prices on the 'Boost Your Ad' page
contact.report_ad: How can I report a violating ad?
contact.report_answer: You can report any violating ad by clicking 'Report' on the ad page

boost_ad.title: Boost Your Ad
boost_ad.subtitle: Make your ad top the results and get the maximum number of views
basic_features: Your ad at the top for 3 days
premium_features: Your ad at the top for a week
vip_features: Your ad at the top for two weeks
boost_ad.increase_views_desc: Get 10 times more views than regular ads
boost_ad.faster_spread_desc: Your ad will reach the largest number of interested people in record time
boost_ad.faster_sales_desc: 80% higher sales rates compared to regular ads
boost_ad.quality_guarantee_desc: Guaranteed service or we refund your money within 48 hours
boost_ad.choose_package: Choose the Right Package for You
boost_ad.step_1_desc: Select the package that suits your needs and budget
boost_ad.step_2_desc: Pay through the secure payment methods available on the website
boost_ad.step_3_desc: Your ad will be boosted automatically within minutes
boost_ad.step_4_desc: Monitor the increase in views and inquiries
boost_ad.starts_answer: Boosting starts immediately after payment confirmation, usually within 5-10 minutes
boost_ad.cancel_answer: Cancellation is possible within the first 24 hours with 50% refund
boost_ad.no_results: What if I don't get results?
boost_ad.results_answer: We guarantee increased views, otherwise we refund the full amount within 48 hours
boost_ad.monitor_performance: How do I monitor my ad performance?
boost_ad.monitor_answer: You'll get a daily report with view count and inquiries
boost_ad.extend_period: Can I extend the boosting period?
boost_ad.extend_answer: Yes, you can extend boosting before the current period ends
boost_ad.payment_answer: We support all bank cards, Mada, Visa, MasterCard, and bank transfer
boost_ad.start_now: Start now and get instant results

advertise.title: Advertise With Us
advertise.subtitle: Reach millions of potential customers in the Eastern Province
advertise.audience_desc: Reach a diverse customer base across different categories and interests
advertise.growth_desc: Our platform is growing daily with more users and visitors
advertise.results_desc: See immediate impact on your business with our advertising solutions
advertise.partnership_desc: We work as your marketing partner to achieve the best results
banner_features: Banner at the top of the homepage
advertise.banner_ads_desc: Visual ads at the top and bottom of pages with attractive and effective design
advertise.mobile_ads_desc: Ads optimized for mobile devices with high click rates
advertise.sponsored_content_desc: Articles and marketing content naturally integrated with the website content
advertise.communication_desc: Contact us to discuss your needs and goals
advertise.planning_desc: We create a customized advertising plan for your business
advertise.implementation_desc: We launch your advertising campaign with the best standards
advertise.follow_up_desc: We monitor performance and continuously improve results
advertise.contact_today: Contact us today and get a free consultation

website_commission.title: Website Commission
website_commission.subtitle: Complete transparency in fees and commissions
website_commission.free_posting_desc: You can post your ad completely free
website_commission.successful_sale_desc: Commission is only taken upon successful sale
website_commission.automatic_deduction_desc: Commission is automatically deducted from the sale price
website_commission.note_desc: Commission is calculated on the final sale price and does not include shipping or insurance fees
website_commission.commission_on_confirmed_sale: Commission is only taken upon sale confirmation
website_commission.report_sale_48h: Must report the sale to the website within 48 hours
website_commission.review_suspicious: The website reserves the right to review suspicious transactions
website_commission.full_protection: Complete protection for buyers and sellers
website_commission.rating_system: Comprehensive rating system to ensure quality
website_commission.technical_support: Continuous technical support to resolve disputes
website_commission.refund_guarantee: Money-back guarantee in cases of fraud
website_commission.support_ready: Our support team is ready to help you anytime

footer.website_description: The leading classified ads website in Dubai and UAE. Search and post your ads easily and confidently.

complaints.title: Complaints and Suggestions
complaints.subtitle: Your opinion matters to us to improve our services
complaints.subject: Message Subject
complaints.enter_ad_number: Ad number related to the complaint
complaints.enter_details: Explain in detail what you want to convey...
guidelines: Be clear and specific in describing the problem or suggestion
Attach any additional information that may help understand the topic
We will contact you within 24-48 hours of receiving your message
All complaints and suggestions are handled with complete confidentiality
complaints.search_story: Based on your suggestions, we added advanced search feature with more accurate filters
complaints.mobile_story: In response to your repeated requests, we developed an easy-to-use mobile app
complaints.chat_story: We added a live chat system between buyers and sellers to facilitate communication
